original_text: Every man also to whom God hath given riches and wealth, and hath given him power to eat thereof, and to take his portion, and to rejoice in his labour; this is the gift of God.
korean_text: 또한 어떤 사람에게든지 하나님이 재물과 부요를 그에게 주사 능히 누리게 하시며 제 몫을 받아 수고함으로 즐거워하게 하신 것은 하나님의 선물이라

sentences.original_text: Every man also to whom God hath given riches and wealth
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 부와 재물을 주신 모든 사람에게

sentences.original_text: and hath given him power to eat thereof
and to rejoice in his labour
this is the gift of God
